items.name: Soft Drink
items.description: The Soda is sure to motivate to keep hydrated. This sparkling water is made by added minerals to boost overall health. This soda has versatile applications and keeps hydrated for an extended period. This soda may also help with digestion and improve oral health.

items.name: Tea
items.description: Give your mornings a refreshing start with our Instant Tea. It is made from carefully sourced Tea to ensure the perfect taste and flavour in every sip. The delicious taste and refreshing aroma make this Tea stand out. It easily and quickly mixes with milk or water to give you a rich colour. It is sure to put you in a better mood instantly, no matter if it is day or night. You can relish a cup during late-night meetings, a perfect accompaniment while reading a book or for kick-starting the day in the right way.
